summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and amending Plat 61 E, Page 150 of the Official Zoning Map of The City of Seattle, Ordinance 86300, to rezone certain property in Block 3, Scenic Park, plus one-half of an alley, from Multiple Residential Low Density (RM) Zone to General Commercial (CG) Zone (Petition of David McDonald, C.F. 289047).
